attributes.action: Negotiate to ensure the safe release of ISIS prisoner British John Cantlie
attributes.additional_details: Information on John may be found at https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Cantlie and there is a Twitter page @Cantlieuk and a change petition for worldwide followers http://tinyurl.com/ktjf3l3
attributes.background: John Cantlie is a British photo journalist held captive by ISIS. He has been used in "Lend me Your Ears" propaganda videos for ISIS.
